column1: Uchi////Conclusion - Uchi's sushi is truly excellent
column2: while tasting plates were hit or miss for us (at $15-$30 per tasting).  Quite unexpectedly
column3: the best things we had were the edamame
column5: and the desserts... coincidentally the least expensive things on the menu :)   The desserts really blew me away - You just can't find desserts like this anywhere else in Houston right now!
